content.title: Intro
content.content:
1929
Preceded by
1929
1930
Year
1931
Followed by
1931

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1930.

content.title: February
content.content: 27 - Joseph Wright, former tutor of Tolkien, dies.

content.title: April
content.content: 18 - Clive Revill, who would voice Thorin in the 2003 video game of The Hobbit, is born.

content.title: May
content.content:
27 - The University Press of Oxford sends J.R.R. Tolkien a copy of A Middle English Reader.
29 - "The Oxford English School", an essay by J.R.R. Tolkien, is published in The Oxford Magazine.

content.title: June
content.content:
3 - Author Marion Zimmer Bradley is born.
9 - Author Lin Carter is born.

content.title: August
content.content: 25 - Bruce Allpress, who would play Aldor in The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers, is born.

content.title: September
content.content:
23 - J.R.R. Tolkien completes a manuscript of The Lay of Aotrou and Itroun
28 - Illustrator Livia Rusz is born.

content.title: November
content.content: 28 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.

content.title: December
content.content: 24 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.

? - J.R.R. Tolkien completes a full draft of The Silmarillion, which is later printed in The Shaping of Middle-earth.
? - War in Heaven, first novel of Inkling Charles Williams, is published.
Years
1927 1928 1929 1930 1931 1932 1933
